Summary: 3 or 4 yearsold, in backyard with mom. Over bungalow rooftop apears blimp like object with sailor garbbed people sitting atop,while others inside a compartment,underneeth blimp,looked as though a boat. it appeared, and I, waved, they waved and they left
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Laval
There were no other sightings in Laval on or around June 30th 1967
divs: sighting detailsi don't know the date,nor the time, since i was very little(3,4,5 years old).i was in the backyard with my mom,playing on the swing set.after playing, i assume, we were on our way into the house.we live in an area were the houses are pretty much the same designs(bungalows),when to our left, above the house roof tops(maybe 20-30ft),there appears a blimp like object.this object had people sitting on top of it(they waved to us,myself and my mom).these people(as best i could describe it)looked like pirates\gypsies.there were others,in,what looked like,a basket like compartment.the blimp,if you will,looked like a boat.there were others moving around on top the blimp like object.the clothing they wore was,similar to frilly\puffy shirts,abd black pants,and black shoes.after they waved to us, they\it just disappeared.this took very little time,now that i think back.this was my first,say,sighting...since then,wierd stuff,when i was maybe,6-7-8 years old.another sighting, when i was in my early teens,yet another sighting in the early 90s,and some wierd stuff pertaining to "place bonaventure ufo, in montreal.my last sighting was in the month of july,either the 2,3,4 in the year 2007 .that one was cool...they all were!������
